text: Since we have heard that certain 15:24 men, whom we did not authorize, have gone out from us and 94.4% ¦ men from among us, whom we did not authorize, have WH 1.7%men, whom we did not authorize, have gone out from us and troubled you with their words, unsettling your minds 15:24 by saying that you must be circumcised and keep the law ¦ --- CTby saying that you must be circumcised and keep the law,
